name: Myriana

specials.name: Nymph’s Beauty
specials.traits: aura, emotion, enchantment, mental, primal, visual
specials.description:
Trigger: creature comes within 30ft of %.
Effect: DC [dc]. On a failed save, the target is stunned 1 for this turn and whenever it begins its turn within 30 feet of % for the next 24 hours, even if it can’t see her on subsequent turns.

specials.name: Frightful Moan
specials.traits: auditory, divine, emotion, enchantment, fear, mental
specials.description:
% laments her fate, forcing each living creature within 30 feet to attempt a Will save DC [dc]. 
Success: temporarily immune to this ghost’s frightful moan for 1 minute. Failure: frightened 2. Critical Failure: frightened 3.

specials.name: Telekinetic Assault
specials.description: % cries out in pain and anguish as small objects and debris fly about in a 30-foot emanation. Creatures in this area take 6d6 bludgeoning damage, subject to a basic Reflex save.

specials.name: Site Bound
specials.description: % cannot leave the Shimmerglens, and becomes slowed 1 if she leaves Whitewillow

specials.name: Focus Beauty
specials.traits: emotion, enchantment, incapacitation, mental, primal, visual
specials.description: DC [dc] On a failed save, if the target was already affected by the naiad queen’s beauty, the image of the queen sears into the creature’s mind, allowing no further sight and effectively blinding the creature until restored via restore senses or a similar effect, or until the naiad queen chooses to remove the effect using a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

specials.name: Change Shape
specials.description: % can change shape but still maintains a ghostly form.

specials.name: Tied to the Land
specials.description: % is intrinsically tied to Whitewillow. As long as % is healthy, the environment is exceptionally resilient. When % becomes physically or psychologically unhealthy, however, her warded region eventually becomes twisted or unhealthy as well. In that case, restoring % swiftly heals the entire region.

specials.name: Rejuvenation
specials.description: If % is destroyed, she re-forms after 2d4 days within Whitewillow, fully healed. % can be permanently destroyed only if someone determines the reason for her existence and sets right whatever prevents the spirit from resting.

specials.name: Wild Empathy
specials.description: % can use Diplomacy to Make an Impression on and make very simple Requests of animals.

spells: tidal surge (at will), summon animal, harm

fleet step, gust of wind, negate aroma
detect magic, guidance, light, ray of frost, stabilize, charm, create water

resistance.value: 20 non-magical, 10 all other damage (except force, ghost touch, or positive)
